entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain at times mixed with wet snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm over higher terrain. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 except northwest 40 gusting to 60 near the water this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
